Class Internship

java.lang.Object
model.Internship
public class Internship extends Object
Represents an internship opportunity in the system. Manages internship details, applications, visibility, and status. Provides methods for validation and filtering. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers, not models (MVC compliance).
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate open, LocalDate close, String company, CompanyRepresentative creator, int slots)
      Constructs a new Internship with the specified details. Automatically assigns a unique ID and adds to the global internship list.
      Parameters:
      title - The internship title
      description - Detailed description
      level - Difficulty level (Basic, Intermediate, Advanced)
      major - Preferred major
      open - Opening date for applications
      close - Closing date for applications
      company - Company name
      creator - Company representative who created this
      slots - Number of available slots

    • Internship

      private Internship(int id, String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate open, LocalDate close, String company, CompanyRepresentative creator, int slots, boolean visible, InternshipStatus status, int filledSlots)
      Private constructor for CSV loading. Allows setting all fields including ID, visibility, status, and filled slots.
      Parameters:
      id - Internship ID
      title - Title
      description - Description
      level - Level
      major - Preferred major
      open - Opening date
      close - Closing date
      company - Company name
      creator - Creator
      slots - Number of slots
      visible - Visibility flag
      status - Status
      filledSlots - Filled slots count

  • Method Details

    • getAllInternships

      public static List<Internship> getAllInternships()
      Get all internships from in-memory list. Note: Loading from CSV is handled by controllers/repositories (MVC compliance).
      Returns:
      list of all internships

    • clearAll

      public static void clearAll()
      Clears all internships from memory. Used by CSV handlers when reloading data.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Gets the internship title.
      Returns:
      the internship title

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Gets the internship description.
      Returns:
      the internship description

    • getLevel

      public String getLevel()
      Gets the difficulty level.
      Returns:
      the difficulty level

    • getPreferredMajor

      public String getPreferredMajor()
      Gets the preferred major for this internship.
      Returns:
      the preferred major

    • getOpenDate

      public LocalDate getOpenDate()
      Gets the application opening date.
      Returns:
      the opening date

    • getCloseDate

      public LocalDate getCloseDate()
      Gets the application closing date.
      Returns:
      the closing date

    • getCompanyName

      public String getCompanyName()
      Gets the company name.
      Returns:
      the company name

      public CompanyRepresentative getCreator()
      Gets the company representative who created this internship.
      Returns:
      the company representative who created this

    • getStatus

      public InternshipStatus getStatus()
      Gets the current internship status.
      Returns:
      the current status

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if internship is visible to users. An internship is visible only if both visibility flag is true AND status is APPROVED.
      Returns:
      true if visible and approved, false otherwise

    • isVisibleToStudent

      public boolean isVisibleToStudent(Student student)
      Check if internship should be visible in listings for a student. Students should NOT see internships with: - Filled status (all slots taken) - Wrong major (doesn't match student's major) - Wrong level (not eligible for student's year of study) - Visibility off (unless they've applied) Applied internships are still visible in listings only if they meet profile requirements.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to check visibility for
      Returns:
      true if visible to the student, false otherwise

    • canStudentViewDetails

      public boolean canStudentViewDetails(Student student)
      Check if a student can view details of this internship. Allows viewing if: 1. Internship is visible to student (normal rules), OR 2. Student has applied for it (can view even if visibility is off).
      Parameters:
      student - the student to check
      Returns:
      true if student can view details, false otherwise

    • hasStudentApplied

      public boolean hasStudentApplied(Student student)
      Check if a student has applied for this internship. Used to allow students to view internships they've applied for even if visibility is off.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to check
      Returns:
      true if student has applied, false otherwise

    • isEligibleForStudent

      public boolean isEligibleForStudent(Student student)
      Checks if a student is eligible to apply for this internship. Delegates to isVisibleToStudent for eligibility checks.
      Parameters:
      student - The student to check eligibility for
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise

    • toggleVisibility

      public boolean toggleVisibility()
      Toggles the visibility of this internship. Can only toggle if status is APPROVED. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Returns:
      true if now visible, false if now invisible

    • canEdit

      public boolean canEdit()
      Check if internship can be edited. Only PENDING and REJECTED internships can be edited.
      Returns:
      true if status is PENDING or REJECTED, false otherwise

    • isFilled

      public boolean isFilled()
      Check if internship is filled (all slots taken)
      Returns:
      true if all slots are filled, false otherwise

    • getNumSlots

      public int getNumSlots()
      Gets the total number of slots.
      Returns:
      the total number of slots

    • getFilledSlots

      public int getFilledSlots()
      Gets the number of filled slots.
      Returns:
      the number of filled slots

    • getApplications

      public ArrayList<Application> getApplications()
      Gets the list of applications for this internship.
      Returns:
      the list of applications

    • getPendingApplicationsCount

      public long getPendingApplicationsCount()
      Gets the count of pending applications for this internship.
      Returns:
      the number of applications with PENDING status

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Gets the unique internship ID.
      Returns:
      the unique internship ID

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(InternshipStatus status)
      Sets the status of this internship. Automatically updates visibility based on status. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Parameters:
      status - The new status to set

    • addApplication

      public void addApplication(Application app)
      Adds an application to this internship. Automatically updates filled slots count.
      Parameters:
      app - The application to add

    • updateFilledSlots

      private void updateFilledSlots()
      Updates the filled slots count based on successful/accepted applications. Automatically sets status to FILLED if all slots are taken.

    • findWithID

      public static Internship findWithID(int id)
      Finds an internship by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The internship ID to search for
      Returns:
      The internship with the given ID, or null if not found

    • updateDetails

      public void updateDetails(String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, int slots)
      Updates the details of this internship. Can only update if status is PENDING. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Parameters:
      title - New title
      description - New description
      level - New level
      major - New preferred major
      openDate - New opening date
      closeDate - New closing date
      slots - New number of slots
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if internship is already approved

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Deletes this internship from the system. Can only delete if status is PENDING or REJECTED. Marks all related applications as WITHDRAWN. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if internship is approved or filled

    • confirmPlacement

      public void confirmPlacement()
      Confirms a placement, updating filled slots. Note: CSV persistence is handled by controllers (MVC compliance).

    • isOwnedBy

      public boolean isOwnedBy(CompanyRepresentative rep)
      Checks if this internship is owned by the given company representative.
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative to check
      Returns:
      true if the given rep is the creator, false otherwise

    • canViewDetails

      public boolean canViewDetails(CompanyRepresentative rep)
      Checks if the given company representative can view details of this internship.
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative to check
      Returns:
      true if the rep owns this internship, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • getInternshipsList

      public static List<Internship> getInternshipsList()
      Gets the internal list of internships. Used by CSV handler for persistence operations.
      Returns:
      The list of all internships

    • getNextID

      public static int getNextID()
      Gets the next available ID.
      Returns:
      The next ID to be assigned

    • setNextID

      public static void setNextID(int id)
      Sets the next ID value. Used by CSV handler when loading from file.
      Parameters:
      id - The new next ID value

    • createForCsv

      public static Internship createForCsv(int id, String title, String description, String level, String major, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, String company, CompanyRepresentative creator, int numSlots, boolean visible, InternshipStatus status, int filledSlots)
      Factory method for creating internships from CSV data. Used by CSV handler to reconstruct internships with all fields.
      Parameters:
      id - Internship ID
      title - Title
      description - Description
      level - Level
      major - Preferred major
      openDate - Opening date
      closeDate - Closing date
      company - Company name
      creator - Creator
      numSlots - Number of slots
      visible - Visibility flag
      status - Status
      filledSlots - Filled slots count
      Returns:
      A new Internship instance

    • getVisibleFlag

      public boolean getVisibleFlag()
      Gets the raw visibility flag value (ignores approval status). Used for CSV persistence and admin displays. For student visibility logic, use isVisible() instead.
      Returns:
      The visibility flag
